channel.title: Chance to appeal
channel.description:
So as some of you may have read from the runescape.com they have transformed their offence system and this gives me (and many other users a chance to appeal banned accounts).
What are the good ways to appeal? Since Im having a chance to appeal after several years what are the key words to use? What are the ways you have got your account(s) unbanned?
Thank you for your help guys and oh the reason Im banned is macroing ofcourse.

item.title: Chance to appeal
item.dc:creator: @atrox atrox_
item.description:
@atrox wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:30, topic:278223”]Offence: Manual Permanent Ban [Bug Abuse]
Offence Date: 23-Mar-2006 16:34:04

Appeal Date: 11-May-2009 22:56:43
Current Date: 28-May-2009

Ugggh. Taking way too long.

Got unbanned after waiting 17 days after sending in the appeal.

Today is my 17th day. :mad:[/quote]
My 17th also :s

Read full topic

item.title: Chance to appeal
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

I have all my offences except for one removed because they’ve been there for two years now. I was never banned, but I’m still muted. I appealed the last offence and after 20 days they told me I appealed it too many times and that’s why it was denied. I appealed once. If I had to wait 20 days to be told that they gave me another appeal just to tell me that I cant use it. I wouldn’t have started playing.

Read full topic

item.title: Chance to appeal
item.dc:creator: @Algas Algas
item.description:
@Algas wrote:

What I found out when my friend appealed on several accounts Jagex told him that due to constant offences your accounts will not be unbanned. So I dont recommend to appeal on several accounts at the same time.

Read full topic

item.title: Chance to appeal
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Pretty sure if your first appeal isn’t accepted, and the offense was added to your account 1-2 years ago, you can re-appeal it again in 21 days once it was denied. Although, if it gets denied again, you will no longer be able to appeal for that offense.

Also:

Hey Guys,

Quick update!!

Unfortunately, like yourselves we have been unable to view evidence on offence appeals since the new offence system went live on Monday. Obviously, we can’t answer an offence appeal with out being able to view the evidence, so have not been able to do them since Monday.

However, this problem is now fixed and we are now able to start on them! However, as detailed in the post above, we have a considerable amount to get through, plus we have the really busy period of the weekend coming up, so the numbers are only going to increase!

This means we could be looking at least a week from now before we get through all those that have already appealed.

Please bear with us and we will keep you updated.

Thanks,

Mod Kris J

Read full topic

item.title: Chance to appeal
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

well no word on silabsoft yet but i didn’t even have to appeal this one lul

Reason: Offence Expired

This offence cannot be appealed, because it has expired and is no longer active on your account. There is no need to appeal the offence, because it is not affecting the status of your account.

It’s odd I know I was banned for macroing on this account as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Chance to appeal
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Haha. I just got my old account unbanned.
It was my “final appeal” chance, And all i put was

[quote=“P I M P 3 D Tut”]Dear Jagex,

I would like to announce to you that I’m in love with goat cheese.
Now If you don’t unban my account,
Then you officially hate goat cheese;
Therefore, God hates you.

Thank you.[/quote]

(:

Read full topic

item.title: Chance to appeal
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

Original Daniel:

Permanent bans for macroing all get rejected - there is a slight chance if you were a member.

Bans are perm for non-members but for members now its a 10day ban only and you get no black marks.

Read full topic

item.title: Chance to appeal
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:15, topic:278223”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=367210.msg2784218#msg2784218 date=1242391986]
Nope :’(

[ img]http://img36.imageshack.us/img36/5379/loli.jpg[/img]
[/quote]

What the hell does “Manual Permanent Ban” mean. Does this mean they got so pissed off with you they had to get a real person to look over your records and ban you.

Jagex are assholes; how can you be permanently banned but still get the chance to be unbanned.
Permanent Ban != Runescape Permanent Ban[/quote]

Just in case it wasn’t your fault the account got banned?

Read full topic
